PickUp.QuestName: Patience is a Virtue that We Don't Need

TurnIn.QuestName: Patience is a Virtue that We Don't Need

PickUp.QuestName: Coward Delivery... Under 30 Minutes or it's Free

CustomBehavior.UseWhen: Unit(25761, u => u.OwnedByUnit == Me && u.DistanceSqr > 30f*30f) != null

CustomBehavior.Text: Waiting for prisoner to catch up.

CustomBehavior.TerminateWhen: Unit(25761, u => u.OwnedByUnit == Me && u.DistanceSqr <= 20f*20f) != null

TurnIn.QuestName: Coward Delivery... Under 30 Minutes or it's Free

CustomBehavior.TerminateWhen: Unit(25584) == null || Unit(25584, u => u.HasAura(45775)) != null || Object(187875) != null
